original_text: Then the man measured the wall of the temple. It was 3 metres thick. There were small rooms along the outside of the wall, all around the temple. Each room was 2 metres wide.
korean_text: 성전의 벽을 측량하니 두께가 여섯 척이며 성전 삼면에 골방이 있는데 너비는 각기 네 척이며

sentences.original_text: Then the man measured the wall of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 사람은 성전의 벽을 측량했습니다

sentences.original_text: There were small rooms along the outside of the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 벽의 바깥쪽을 따라 작은 방들이 있었습니다
